projects.description: Its a website which generates and displays random quotes each time a user clicks a button
This application dynamically divides a long list of students into pagination links desplaying only a set number of students on each page and it provides a navigation to jump to the next list

Its a Web application which collects informtion from users, the form also validates the input such that any wrong data provided by the user will give back error messages. I used JavaScript and jQuery to enhace te form so that its interactive and easy to use

This is a browser based phrase guessing game. It randomly generates a phrase. Then the user can either type or click a letter which they guess. If the letters selected were correct the letter will appear in a field. If not, a heart will be taken away. After the user loses its hearts the game is over. It uses OOP and JavaScript
Using JavaScript, I created an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API.
